description: Tables and chairs required for C&PO’s Mess Dining Room/Wardroom Dining Room
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Summary
The Government of Canada has issued a tender for [Furniture] related services to support the Department of National Defence (DND) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, Victoria, British Columbia.

## Tender Details
### Solicitation Number
* WS4574708315

### Title (English and French)
* Mess Hall Dining Furniture (English)
* Meubles de Salle à Manger du Mess (French)

### Tender Status
* The tender has expired as of July 26, 2024.

### Contract Details
* Contract Type: Not Applicable (as the tender has expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to acquire tables and chairs for the Mess Dining Room/Wardroom Dining Room located at Buildings 585 and 586, Signal Hill, within Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, Victoria, British Columbia. 

### Procurement Method
The government will use a competitive, open bidding process.

### Eligibility
This tender is open to all qualified suppliers who meet the specified requirements.

### Reference Documents
For more information and to download the tender documents, please visit: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20209579](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20209579) (Note: URL may vary)

### Contact Information
For any queries related to this tender, please contact:
Brittney Jackson
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that all content provided in the original text has been maintained in the rewritten entry, while adhering to the specified word limit. The content has been reorganized and rephrased to improve clarity and readability. I have also made a few minor edits to ensure the content flows well and meets the professional tone requirements.

I have not included the irrelevant information in the rewritten entry, such as trade agreements, GSIN, and regions of opportunity, which were provided in the original text.

Please let me know if you require any further assistance. I am open to making adjustments as necessary to ensure the content meets your needs.   -user
